P076338.project_name: Development of State Statistics System for Monitoring Social & Economic Transformation Project

keywords.cdata: ABBREVIATIONS, ACRONYMS, Action Plan, backbone, basic, beneficiaries, capacity building, Communication Technology, components, CONTENTS, data collection methods, data processing, data processing system, data storage, electronic data, enterprise surveys, financial statistics, ICT, implementation process, Information and Communication Technology, institutional capacity, Number of users, Outcome Indicators, poverty indicators, programs, Project Management, project objectives, prototype, registers, reliability, result, RESULTS, site, software products, statistical classification, statistical data, system design, system development, technical requirements, users, uses, WEB, Websites

project_abstract.cdata: The development objective of the Development of the State Statistics System for Monitoring the Social and Economic Transformation Project is to build a sustainable state statistical system which efficiently provides timely and accurate data for policy evaluation and decision making. The restructuring and project extension are due primarily to delays in the signing of the contract for the development of the integrated data processing system. The $4 million contract ultimately became effective in July 2010 and is estimated to take 25 months to complete. The project closing date was previously extended by one year to December 31, 2010. Other project activities are on track for completion by the end of 2010 and it has been agreed with the client that this second extension will only include activities relating to the development of the data processing system. The extension will constitute the second extension of the closing date. The extension has been discussed with the Ministry of Finance of Ukraine (MoF), and it was agreed that the extension will solely include activities related to the development of the Information and Communication System (ICT) system.
